prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a sturdy build and a fierce expression.
I want a ground-type Pokemon that resembles a dinosaur and has a robust body.
Generate a Pokemon that combines elements of strength and durability, perfect for battles.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous terrains, featuring rocky textures and earthy colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that showcases power and resilience with distinct horned features.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of adventure in rugged landscapes.
Show me a Pokemon that has a playful demeanor but is also known for its combat skills.
